review: she is very nice person.. one thing the doctor must have is that patience.. she has a lot.. she is listening to everything  and gave me suggestions also..she is giving medication in such a way that they are effortable.. prescribing required medication only.. not more than that.. I am recommending her..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is mother like. I felt like I am talking to some who really understand. I have pcos condition and was trying to conceive. However I was not getting my periods at all. She recommend me medicines. I am on them now. Will get it checked in 6 months again. I basically went for second opinion because my first gynac suggested surgery and I was surprised I am just 29 years of age. However , after my meeting Dr Laxmi, I was convinced to follow her medication.

Total I don't recommend Dr SV Lakshmi  to any pregnant womens who is 1st time
